mapper.select: SELECT mr_rez.*, mr.mr_type FROM mr_rez JOIN mr ON mr_rez.mr_code = mr.mr_code WHERE TRUNC(mr_rez.rez_start_time) = TRUNC(TO_DATE(#{rez_start_time}, 'YYYY-MM-DD'))

SELECT * FROM mr_rez WHERE mr_code = #{mr_code} AND ( (#{rez_start_time} <= rez_end_time AND #{rez_end_time} >= rez_start_time) OR (rez_start_time <= #{rez_end_time} AND rez_end_time >= #{rez_start_time}) )
mapper.insert:
select 'BMR' || LPAD(TO_CHAR(BM_MR_SEQ.NEXTVAL), 3, '0') from dual
INSERT INTO BM_MR (BM_MR_CODE, MEM_CODE, MR_CODE, CREATED_AT, UPDATED_AT, DELETED_AT) VALUES (#{bm_mr_code}, #{mem_code}, #{mr_code}, localtimestamp, null, null)
mapper.select: SELECT r.mr_rez_code, r.mem_code, r.rez_start_time, r.rez_end_time, r.created_at, r.updated_at, r.deleted_at, r.rez_status, r.m_name, r.m_type, r.is_confirmed, r.rez_type, m.mr_code, m.mr_name, m.maximum_capacity, m.location, p.mr_pt_code, p.mem_code, mem.mem_code AS pt_mem_code, mem.position_name, mem.name, mem.email, mem.profile_img_url, dept.dept_code, dept.dept_name, mi.img_code, mi.url, mop.op_day_code, mop.day, mk.keyword_code, mk.keyword_name FROM ( SELECT * FROM ( SELECT * FROM MR_REZ WHERE mem_code = #{mem_code} AND deleted_at IS NULL ORDER BY created_at DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM <= 10 ) r JOIN MR m ON r.mr_code = m.mr_code LEFT JOIN MR_IMG mi ON m.mr_code = mi.mr_code LEFT JOIN MR_OP_DAY mop ON m.mr_code = mop.mr_code LEFT JOIN MR_KEYWORD mk ON m.mr_code = mk.mr_code LEFT JOIN MR_PT p ON r.mr_rez_code = p.mr_rez_code AND p.deleted_at IS NULL LEFT JOIN MEM mem ON p.mem_code = mem.mem_code LEFT JOIN DEPT dept ON mem.dept_code = dept.dept_code WHERE r.deleted_at IS NULL

SELECT r.mr_rez_code, r.mem_code, r.rez_start_time, r.rez_end_time, r.created_at, r.updated_at, r.deleted_at, r.rez_status, r.m_name, r.m_type, r.is_confirmed, r.rez_type, m.mr_code, m.mr_name, m.maximum_capacity, m.location, p.mr_pt_code, p.mem_code, mem.mem_code AS pt_mem_code, mem.position_name, mem.name, mem.email, mem.profile_img_url, dept.dept_code, dept.dept_name, mi.img_code, mi.url, mop.op_day_code, mop.day, mk.keyword_code, mk.keyword_name FROM MR_REZ r JOIN MR m ON r.mr_code = m.mr_code LEFT JOIN MR_IMG mi ON m.mr_code = mi.mr_code LEFT JOIN MR_OP_DAY mop ON m.mr_code = mop.mr_code LEFT JOIN MR_KEYWORD mk ON m.mr_code = mk.mr_code LEFT JOIN MR_PT p ON r.mr_rez_code = p.mr_rez_code LEFT JOIN MEM mem ON p.mem_code = mem.mem_code LEFT JOIN DEPT dept ON mem.dept_code = dept.dept_code WHERE r.mem_code = #{mem_code} AND r.deleted_at IS NULL AND p.deleted_at IS NULL

SELECT r.mr_rez_code, r.mem_code, r.rez_start_time, r.rez_end_time, r.created_at, r.updated_at, r.deleted_at, r.rez_status, r.m_name, r.m_type, r.is_confirmed, r.rez_type, m.mr_code, m.mr_name, m.maximum_capacity, m.location, p.mr_pt_code, p.mem_code, mem.mem_code AS pt_mem_code, mem.position_name, mem.name, mem.email, mem.profile_img_url, dept.dept_code, dept.dept_name, mi.img_code, mi.url, mop.op_day_code, mop.day, mk.keyword_code, mk.keyword_name FROM MR_REZ r JOIN MR m ON r.mr_code = m.mr_code LEFT JOIN MR_IMG mi ON m.mr_code = mi.mr_code LEFT JOIN MR_OP_DAY mop ON m.mr_code = mop.mr_code LEFT JOIN MR_KEYWORD mk ON m.mr_code = mk.mr_code LEFT JOIN MR_PT p ON r.mr_rez_code = p.mr_rez_code LEFT JOIN MEM mem ON p.mem_code = mem.mem_code LEFT JOIN DEPT dept ON mem.dept_code = dept.dept_code WHERE r.mr_rez_code = #{mr_rez_code} AND r.deleted_at IS NULL AND p.deleted_at IS NULL
SELECT * from mr_pt where mr_rez_code=#{mr_rez_code} AND deleted_at IS NULL
select mr_rez_code from MR_PT where MEM_CODE=#{mem_code}
mapper.insert:
select 'REZ' || LPAD(TO_CHAR(MR_REZ_SEQ.NEXTVAL), 3, '0') from dual
INSERT INTO MR_REZ (MR_REZ_CODE, MEM_CODE, MR_CODE, REZ_START_TIME, REZ_END_TIME, CREATED_AT, UPDATED_AT, DELETED_AT, REZ_STATUS, M_NAME, M_TYPE, IS_CONFIRMED, REZ_TYPE, TOT_PT_CTN) VALUES (#{mr_rez_code}, #{mem_code}, #{mr_code}, #{rez_start_time}, #{rez_end_time}, localtimestamp, null, null, '완료', #{m_name}, #{m_type}, 0, 0, #{tot_pt_ctn})
mapper.update: UPDATE MR_REZ SET MEM_CODE = #{mem_code}, MR_CODE = #{mr_code}, REZ_START_TIME = #{rez_start_time}, REZ_END_TIME = #{rez_end_time}, UPDATED_AT = localtimestamp, REZ_STATUS = '완료', M_NAME = #{m_name}, M_TYPE = #{m_type}, IS_CONFIRMED = 0, REZ_TYPE = 0, TOT_PT_CTN = #{tot_pt_ctn} WHERE MR_REZ_CODE = #{mr_rez_code}
mapper.insert:
select 'PT' || LPAD(TO_CHAR(MR_PT_SEQ.NEXTVAL), 3, '0') from dual
INSERT INTO MR_PT (mr_pt_code, mr_rez_code, mem_code, created_at, updated_at, deleted_at) VALUES (#{mr_pt_code}, #{mr_rez_code}, #{mem_code}, localtimestamp, null, null)

INSERT INTO BM_GROUP (BM_GROUP_CODE, MEM_CODE, BM_GROUP_NAME, CREATED_AT, UPDATED_AT, DELETED_AT) SELECT 'BMG' || LPAD(TO_CHAR(BM_GROUP_SEQ.NEXTVAL), 3, '0'), #{mem_code}, CASE WHEN #{bm_group_name} = '' THEN NULL ELSE #{bm_group_name} END, localtimestamp, null, null FROM dual
mapper.select: SELECT bm_group_code FROM BM_GROUP WHERE MEM_CODE=#{mem_code} ORDER BY CREATED_AT DESC FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY
mapper.insert:
select 'BMM' || LPAD(TO_CHAR(BM_GROUP_MEM_SEQ.NEXTVAL), 3, '0') from dual
INSERT INTO BM_GROUP_MEM (BM_CODE, BM_GROUP_CODE, MEM_CODE, CREATED_AT, UPDATED_AT, DELETED_AT) VALUES (#{bm_code}, #{bm_group_code}, #{mem_code}, localtimestamp, null, null)
mapper.select: SELECT M.mem_code, M.dept_code, M.position_name, M.name, M.email, M.role, M.profile_img_url, M.hired_at, M.created_at, M.address, M.tel, M.is_worked, D.dept_name, D.dept_tel, D.dept_head_code, D.location AS location FROM MEM M INNER JOIN DEPT D ON M.dept_code = D.dept_code WHERE M.mem_code = #{mem_code}

SELECT M.mem_code, M.dept_code, M.position_name, M.name, M.email, M.role, M.profile_img_url, M.hired_at, M.created_at, M.address, M.tel, M.is_worked, D.dept_name, D.dept_tel , D.dept_head_code, D.location AS FROM MEM M INNER JOIN DEPT D ON M.dept_code = D.dept_code

SELECT m.*, mk.keyword_code, mk.keyword_name, mi.img_code, mi.url, mop.op_day_code, mop.day, ms.supplies_code, s.supplies_name FROM mr m LEFT JOIN MR_IMG mi ON m.MR_CODE = mi.MR_CODE LEFT JOIN MR_OP_DAY mop ON m.MR_CODE = mop.MR_CODE LEFT JOIN MR_KEYWORD mk ON m.MR_CODE = mk.MR_CODE LEFT JOIN MR_SUPPLIES ms ON m.MR_CODE = ms.MR_CODE LEFT JOIN SUPPLIES s ON ms.SUPPLIES_CODE = s.SUPPLIES_CODE WHERE m.mr_code=#{mr_code}

SELECT m.*, mk.keyword_code, mk.keyword_name, mi.img_code, mi.url, mop.op_day_code, mop.day, ms.supplies_code, s.supplies_name FROM mr m LEFT JOIN MR_IMG mi ON m.MR_CODE = mi.MR_CODE LEFT JOIN MR_OP_DAY mop ON m.MR_CODE = mop.MR_CODE LEFT JOIN MR_KEYWORD mk ON m.MR_CODE = mk.MR_CODE LEFT JOIN MR_SUPPLIES ms ON m.MR_CODE = ms.MR_CODE LEFT JOIN SUPPLIES s ON ms.SUPPLIES_CODE = s.SUPPLIES_CODE WHERE m.mr_code NOT IN ( SELECT DISTINCT mr_code FROM mr_rez WHERE TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(rez_start_time, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') = TO_DATE(#{rez_date}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND ( (TO_TIMESTAMP(TO_CHAR(rez_start_time, 'HH24:MI'), 'HH24:MI') <= TO_TIMESTAMP(#{rez_start_time}, 'HH24:MI') AND TO_TIMESTAMP(TO_CHAR(rez_end_time, 'HH24:MI'), 'HH24:MI') > TO_TIMESTAMP(#{rez_start_time}, 'HH24:MI') AND TO_TIMESTAMP(TO_CHAR(rez_end_time, 'HH24:MI'), 'HH24:MI') <= TO_TIMESTAMP(#{rez_end_time}, 'HH24:MI')) OR (TO_TIMESTAMP(TO_CHAR(rez_start_time, 'HH24:MI'), 'HH24:MI') >= TO_TIMESTAMP(#{rez_start_time}, 'HH24:MI') AND TO_TIMESTAMP(TO_CHAR(rez_start_time, 'HH24:MI'), 'HH24:MI') < TO_TIMESTAMP(#{rez_end_time}, 'HH24:MI') AND TO_TIMESTAMP(TO_CHAR(rez_end_time, 'HH24:MI'), 'HH24:MI') >= TO_TIMESTAMP(#{rez_end_time}, 'HH24:MI')) OR (TO_TIMESTAMP(TO_CHAR(rez_start_time, 'HH24:MI'), 'HH24:MI') <= TO_TIMESTAMP(#{rez_start_time}, 'HH24:MI') AND TO_TIMESTAMP(TO_CHAR(rez_end_time, 'HH24:MI'), 'HH24:MI') >= TO_TIMESTAMP(#{rez_end_time}, 'HH24:MI')) OR (TO_TIMESTAMP(TO_CHAR(rez_start_time, 'HH24:MI'), 'HH24:MI') >= TO_TIMESTAMP(#{rez_start_time}, 'HH24:MI') AND TO_TIMESTAMP(TO_CHAR(rez_end_time, 'HH24:MI'), 'HH24:MI') <= TO_TIMESTAMP(#{rez_end_time}, 'HH24:MI')) ) AND ( (m.MR_CODE NOT IN ( SELECT DISTINCT mr_code FROM mr_rez WHERE TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(rez_start_time, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') = TO_DATE(#{rez_date}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND ( (TO_TIMESTAMP(TO_CHAR(rez_start_time, 'HH24:MI'), 'HH24:MI') <= TO_TIMESTAMP(#{rez_start_time}, 'HH24:MI') AND TO_TIMESTAMP(TO_CHAR(rez_end_time, 'HH24:MI'), 'HH24:MI') > TO_TIMESTAMP(#{rez_start_time}, 'HH24:MI') AND TO_TIMESTAMP(TO_CHAR(rez_end_time, 'HH24:MI'), 'HH24:MI') <= TO_TIMESTAMP(#{rez_end_time}, 'HH24:MI')) OR (TO_TIMESTAMP(TO_CHAR(rez_start_time, 'HH24:MI'), 'HH24:MI') >= TO_TIMESTAMP(#{rez_start_time}, 'HH24:MI') AND TO_TIMESTAMP(TO_CHAR(rez_start_time, 'HH24:MI'), 'HH24:MI') < TO_TIMESTAMP(#{rez_end_time}, 'HH24:MI') AND TO_TIMESTAMP(TO_CHAR(rez_end_time, 'HH24:MI'), 'HH24:MI') >= TO_TIMESTAMP(#{rez_end_time}, 'HH24:MI')) OR (TO_TIMESTAMP(TO_CHAR(rez_start_time, 'HH24:MI'), 'HH24:MI') <= TO_TIMESTAMP(#{rez_start_time}, 'HH24:MI') AND TO_TIMESTAMP(TO_CHAR(rez_end_time, 'HH24:MI'), 'HH24:MI') >= TO_TIMESTAMP(#{rez_end_time}, 'HH24:MI')) OR (TO_TIMESTAMP(TO_CHAR(rez_start_time, 'HH24:MI'), 'HH24:MI') >= TO_TIMESTAMP(#{rez_start_time}, 'HH24:MI') AND TO_TIMESTAMP(TO_CHAR(rez_end_time, 'HH24:MI'), 'HH24:MI') <= TO_TIMESTAMP(#{rez_end_time}, 'HH24:MI')) ) AND deleted_at IS NULL )) OR (m.MR_CODE IN ( SELECT DISTINCT mr_code FROM mr_rez WHERE TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(rez_start_time, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') = TO_DATE(#{rez_date}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND ( (TO_TIMESTAMP(TO_CHAR(rez_start_time, 'HH24:MI'), 'HH24:MI') <= TO_TIMESTAMP(#{rez_start_time}, 'HH24:MI') AND TO_TIMESTAMP(TO_CHAR(rez_end_time, 'HH24:MI'), 'HH24:MI') > TO_TIMESTAMP(#{rez_start_time}, 'HH24:MI') AND TO_TIMESTAMP(TO_CHAR(rez_end_time, 'HH24:MI'), 'HH24:MI') <= TO_TIMESTAMP(#{rez_end_time}, 'HH24:MI')) OR (TO_TIMESTAMP(TO_CHAR(rez_start_time, 'HH24:MI'), 'HH24:MI') >= TO_TIMESTAMP(#{rez_start_time}, 'HH24:MI') AND TO_TIMESTAMP(TO_CHAR(rez_start_time, 'HH24:MI'), 'HH24:MI') < TO_TIMESTAMP(#{rez_end_time}, 'HH24:MI') AND TO_TIMESTAMP(TO_CHAR(rez_end_time, 'HH24:MI'), 'HH24:MI') >= TO_TIMESTAMP(#{rez_end_time}, 'HH24:MI')) OR (TO_TIMESTAMP(TO_CHAR(rez_start_time, 'HH24:MI'), 'HH24:MI') <= TO_TIMESTAMP(#{rez_start_time}, 'HH24:MI') AND TO_TIMESTAMP(TO_CHAR(rez_end_time, 'HH24:MI'), 'HH24:MI') >= TO_TIMESTAMP(#{rez_end_time}, 'HH24:MI')) OR (TO_TIMESTAMP(TO_CHAR(rez_start_time, 'HH24:MI'), 'HH24:MI') >= TO_TIMESTAMP(#{rez_start_time}, 'HH24:MI') AND TO_TIMESTAMP(TO_CHAR(rez_end_time, 'HH24:MI'), 'HH24:MI') <= TO_TIMESTAMP(#{rez_end_time}, 'HH24:MI')) ) AND deleted_at IS NOT NULL )) ) ) AND ( (#{tot_pt_ctn} <= m.maximum_capacity AND m.mr_type = '소회의실') OR (#{tot_pt_ctn} <= m.maximum_capacity AND m.mr_type = '중회의실') OR (#{tot_pt_ctn} <= m.maximum_capacity AND m.mr_type = '대회의실') ) AND m.is_opened = 0

SELECT r.mr_rez_code, r.mem_code, r.rez_start_time, r.rez_end_time, r.created_at, r.updated_at, r.deleted_at, r.rez_status, r.m_name, r.m_type, r.is_confirmed, r.rez_type, m.mr_code, m.mr_name, m.maximum_capacity, m.location, p.mr_pt_code, p.mem_code, mem.mem_code AS pt_mem_code, mem.position_name, mem.name, mem.email, mem.profile_img_url, dept.dept_code, dept.dept_name, mi.img_code, mi.url, mop.op_day_code, mop.day, mk.keyword_code, mk.keyword_name FROM ( SELECT * FROM MR_REZ WHERE mem_code = #{mem_code} ORDER BY created_at DESC ) r JOIN MR m ON r.mr_code = m.mr_code LEFT JOIN MR_IMG mi ON m.mr_code = mi.mr_code LEFT JOIN MR_OP_DAY mop ON m.mr_code = mop.mr_code LEFT JOIN MR_KEYWORD mk ON m.mr_code = mk.mr_code LEFT JOIN MR_PT p ON r.mr_rez_code = p.mr_rez_code LEFT JOIN MEM mem ON p.mem_code = mem.mem_code LEFT JOIN DEPT dept ON mem.dept_code = dept.dept_code WHERE ROWNUM <= 10 AND r.deleted_at IS NULL AND p.deleted_at IS NULL

SELECT BMG.bm_group_code, BMG.bm_group_name, M.mem_code, M.name, M.POSITION_NAME, M.email, M.profile_img_url, M.TEL, D.dept_name FROM BM_GROUP BMG JOIN BM_GROUP_MEM GM ON BMG.bm_group_code = GM.bm_group_code JOIN MEM M ON GM.mem_code = M.mem_code JOIN DEPT D ON M.dept_code = D.dept_code WHERE BMG.mem_code = #{mem_code}

WITH time_series AS ( SELECT TO_DATE(#{date} || ' 09:00', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') + (LEVEL - 1) * (30 / (24 * 60)) AS time_slot_start, TO_DATE(#{date} || ' 09:00', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') + LEVEL * (30 / (24 * 60)) AS time_slot_end FROM dual CONNECT BY TO_DATE(#{date} || ' 09:00', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') + (LEVEL - 1) * (30 / (24 * 60)) < TO_DATE(#{date} || ' 18:00', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') ) SELECT TO_CHAR(time_series.time_slot_start, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS rez_time, MR.mr_type, COUNT(MR_REZ.mr_rez_code) AS REZ_CNT FROM time_series JOIN MR_REZ ON time_series.time_slot_start >= MR_REZ.rez_start_time AND time_series.time_slot_start < MR_REZ.rez_end_time JOIN MR ON MR_REZ.mr_code = MR.mr_code WHERE MR_REZ.DELETED_AT IS NULL GROUP BY TO_CHAR(time_series.time_slot_start, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), MR.mr_type ORDER BY TO_CHAR(time_series.time_slot_start, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')
select mr_rez_code from mr_rez where rez_status='완료'
select mem_code from mr_pt where mr_rez_code=#{mr_rez_code}
